snippet: On March 9, 1862, during the Civil War, the Monitor and the Virginia (also known as the Merrimac) clashed to a draw at Hampton Roads, Va., in the first battle between two ironclad warships.
abstract: On March 9, 1862, during the Civil War, the Monitor and the Virginia (also known as the Merrimac) clashed to a draw at Hampton Roads, Va., in the first battle between two ironclad warships.

headline.main: March 9, 1862 | The Monitor and Merrimac Face Off in Battle of Hampton Roads
